text:
この前
「忙しい」って時は
一日中ソファーに
座ってたろ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 6.38%;top: 4.85%;width: 15.87%;height: 8.38%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;font-weight: normal;

text:
上に座って
気付いたよ!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 12.59%;top: 13.90%;width: 11.10%;height: 6.20%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;font-weight: normal;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 76.07%;top: 2.92%;width: 8.59%;height: 3.44%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;font-weight: normal;

text:
トイレ
じゃなくて
よかったわね
style: font-size: 12px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 72.49%;top: 13.99%;width: 13.25%;height: 3.69%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;font-weight: normal;

text:
待てよ
エコーの家?
到着予定は30分前。
なんで誰も
起こさねぇ
んだよ?
